name: Scrim 3D Demo
description:
Take the role of the protagonist, a random chicken dude who stumbles unto something far greater than himself. 

Made using rpg maker MV.

-----------------------------------------------------------

Little game I was working on, but I will probably never finish. It was a great learning experience though! If you want to support me, listen to the OST here in bandcamp: https://djtakataka.bandcamp.com/album/scrim-3d-demo-ost

Credits to Vizzbgit for the beautiful portrait art!
